trans-unit.source: Defines a point, associated with an activity execution status change, to be tracked that is in the potential execution path of a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 변경과 연결 된 활동 실행 상태를 추적할 워크플로 인스턴스의 잠재적 실행 경로에 있는 지점을 정의 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스는 상속 될 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Whenever the execution status of an activity changes, the workflow instance emits an activity status event to the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]활동 실행 상태가 변경 될 때마다 워크플로 인스턴스는 런타임 추적 인프라에는 활동 상태 이벤트를 내보냅니다.

trans-unit.source: An ActivityTrackPoint defines a point of interest in the potential execution path of a workflow, qualified by such an activity status event.
trans-unit.target: ActivityTrackPoint 이러한 활동 상태 이벤트로 한정 된 워크플로의 잠재적 실행 경로에 관심 지점을 정의 합니다.

trans-unit.source: An ActivityTrackPoint contains locations that are included in matching, locations that are excluded from matching, and the data that should be extracted from the workflow instance when the track point is matched.
trans-unit.target: ActivityTrackPoint 일치에 포함 되는 위치, 일치에서 제외 되는 위치 및 추적 지점이 일치할 때 워크플로 인스턴스에서 추출 되어야 하는 데이터를 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: You can add an ActivityTrackPoint to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.ActivityTrackPoints%2A> to instruct the runtime tracking infrastructure to send an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> to the tracking service when the specified set of activity status events occur.
trans-unit.target: ActivityTrackPoint를 추가할 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.ActivityTrackPoints%2A>를 보내도록 런타임 추적 인프라는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>지정된 된 활동 상태 이벤트 집합이 발생할 때 추적 서비스로.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.ActivityTrackPoints%2A>

trans-unit.source: A single ActivityTrackPoint may be matched at multiple points in the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 단일 ActivityTrackPoint 워크플로 인스턴스의 여러 지점에서 일치할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> contains match conditions for a location or locations in the potential execution path of a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>위치나 워크플로 인스턴스의 잠재적 실행 경로 있는 위치에 대 한 일치 조건을 포함 합니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: You can add <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> objects to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A> to define locations that should be included in matching by the track point.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>개체를 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A>추적 지점별 일치에 포함 해야 하는 위치를 정의할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, you can add <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> objects to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A> to define locations that should be excluded from matching by the track point.
trans-unit.target: 마찬가지로, 추가할 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>개체를 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A>추적 지점별 일치에서 제외 해야 하는 위치를 정의할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: You can add <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract> objects and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract> objects to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.Extracts%2A> to specify data that should be extracted from the workflow instance when the track point is matched.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract>개체 및 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract>개체를 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.Extracts%2A>추적 지점이 일치할 때 워크플로 인스턴스에서 추출 되어야 하는 데이터를 지정할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.Extracts%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract>

trans-unit.source: The extracted data will be included in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>.
trans-unit.target: 추출 된 데이터에 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> 에 포함 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: You can add to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.Annotations%2A> to specify additional information associated with the track point.
trans-unit.target: 에 추가할 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.Annotations%2A>추적 지점과 연결 된 추가 정보를 지정 합니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.Annotations%2A>

trans-unit.source: These annotations will be included in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> sent when the track point is matched.
trans-unit.target: 이러한 주석은에 포함 됩니다는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>추적 지점이 일치할 때 전송 됩니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default constructor initializes an empty track point.
trans-unit.target: 기본 생성자는 빈 추적 지점을 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: No matching locations, excluded locations, data extracts or annotations are specified.
trans-unit.target: 없는 일치 하는 위치, 제외 된 위치가, 데이터 추출 물 또는 주석이 지정 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: You must configure the track point by adding at least one <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 추가 하 여 하나 이상의 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> 추적 지점을 구성 해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: You may optionally add objects to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.Extracts%2A>, and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.Annotations%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 개체를 선택적으로 추가할 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.Extracts%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.Annotations%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.Annotations%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.Extracts%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of annotations associated with the track point.
trans-unit.target: 추적 지점과 연결 된 주석 컬렉션을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: You can add to Annotations to specify annotations to be returned in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> sent to the tracking service when the track point is matched.
trans-unit.target: 에 반환 될 주석을 지정할 주석을 추가할 수는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>추적 지점이 일치할 때 추적 서비스로 보낼.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>

trans-unit.source: If Annotations is empty, no annotations are associated with the track point.
trans-unit.target: 주석이 비어 있으면 없는 주석은 추적 지점과 연결 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Annotations are `strings` that you define that contain information associated with the track point.
trans-unit.target: 주석은 `strings` 추적 지점과 연결 된 정보를 포함 하는 정의 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, an annotation could contain information about the possible execution path the workflow can take from this track point, or it could contain information to be displayed in a user interface.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 주석은 워크플로가이 추적 지점에서 사용할 수 있는 실행 경로 대 한 정보를 포함 하거나 사용자 인터페이스에 표시 될 정보를 포함할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingAnnotationCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: An <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingAnnotationCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 빈 컬렉션입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of locations that should be excluded from the track point by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 런타임 추적 인프라가 추적 지점에서 제외 해야 하는 위치 컬렉션을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: If any <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> in ExcludedLocations is matched for a particular activity status event, the track point will not be matched and no <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> will be sent to the tracking service.
trans-unit.target: 있는 경우 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>에서 특정 활동 상태 이벤트에 대 한 일치 ExcludedLocations, 추적 지점은 일치 되지 되지 않은 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>를 추적 서비스로 전송 됩니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: If ExcludedLocations is empty, there are no excluded locations.
trans-unit.target: ExcludedLocations 비어 있으면 제외 된 위치가 없습니다 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: You can use ExcludedLocations to specifically exclude locations from being tracked by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 특히 런타임 추적 인프라에서 추적 중인에서 위치를 제외 하려면 ExcludedLocations를 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to track all <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activities except the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activity with an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name%2A> property of "Code1", you can define an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> that matches all <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activities and add it to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어, 모든 추적 하려는 경우 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>제외 하 고는 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>활동과 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name%2A>"code1" 속성을 정의할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>모두 일치 하는 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>활동 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A> 에 추가 하려면</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>

trans-unit.source: Then you can define another <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> that matches <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activities with an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name%2A> property set to "Code1" and add it to ExcludedLocations.
trans-unit.target: 다른 정의할 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>일치 하는 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>사용 하 여 활동은 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name%2A>속성이 "Code1"로 설정 하 고 ExcludedLocations에 추가 합니다.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: The track point will then match all <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activities except the "Code1" activity.
trans-unit.target: 추적 지점이 일치 합니다 모든 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>"Code1" 활동을 제외 하 고 활동.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocationCollection"></xref> that specifies locations to be excluded from the track point.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocationCollection"> </xref> 추적 지점에서 제외할 위치를 지정 하는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 빈 컬렉션입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection that specifies data to be extracted from the workflow instance and sent to the tracking service.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로 인스턴스에서 추출 하 고 추적 서비스로 보낼 데이터를 지정 하는 컬렉션을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: When a track point is matched, the runtime tracking infrastructure can extract data from the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 추적 지점이 일치할 때 런타임 추적 인프라가 워크플로 인스턴스에서 데이터를 추출할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The runtime tracking infrastructure encapsulates the extracted data in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem> objects that it puts in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.Body%2A> of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> that it sends to the tracking service.
trans-unit.target: 런타임 추적 인프라는 추출 된 데이터를 캡슐화 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem>에 배치 하는 개체는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.Body%2A>의 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>를 추적 서비스로 보내는.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.Body%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem>

trans-unit.source: If Extracts is empty, no data will be extracted.
trans-unit.target: 추출이 비어 있으면 데이터가 추출 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: You can add <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract> objects to Extracts to specify member data that should be extracted from the activity associated with this track point, and you can add <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract> objects to Extracts to specify member data that should be extracted from the activity of the workflow.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract>이 추적 지점와 관련 된 개체를 추출 된 활동에서 추출 되어야 하는 멤버 데이터를 지정 하 고 추가할 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract>워크플로의 활동에서 추출 되어야 하는 멤버 데이터를 지정 하는 추출 하는 개체입니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ExtractCollection"></xref> that specifies the data to be extracted and sent to the tracking service.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ExtractCollection"> </xref> 를 추출 하 고 추적 서비스로 보낼 데이터를 지정 하는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 빈 컬렉션입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of locations that should be included in matching for the track point by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 런타임 추적 인프라가 추적 지점에 대 한 일치에 포함 해야 하는 위치 컬렉션을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: If MatchingLocations is empty, the track point cannot be matched by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: MatchingLocations이 비어 있으면 런타임 추적 인프라에서 추적 지점을 일치 하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: You must add at least one <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> to MatchingLocations for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> to participate in matching.
trans-unit.target: 하나 이상 추가 해야 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>에 대 한 MatchingLocations에는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint>일치에 참여 하려면.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: The track point will be matched if any <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> in MatchingLocations is matched by the runtime tracking infrastructure and no <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A> is matched.
trans-unit.target: 있는 경우 추적 지점은 일치 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>MatchingLocations에 일치 하는 런타임 추적 인프라와 아니요 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>에 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A>일치 합니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocationCollection"></xref> that specifies the locations to be matched for the track point.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocationCollection"> </xref> 추적 지점에 일치 시킬 수 있는 위치를 지정 하는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 빈 컬렉션입니다.
